mapper.insert: insert into waypoint(day_no, content_id, waypoint_order, waypoint_content) values (#{dayNo}, #{contentId}, #{waypointOrder}, #{waypointContent})
mapper.select: select waypoint_no, day_no, W.content_id as content_id, waypoint_order, waypoint_content, waypoint_status, waypoint_add_time, title as content_title, addr1 as content_addr1, first_image as content_first_image from waypoint W join attraction_info A on W.content_id = A.content_id where waypoint_status = 1 and day_no = #{dayNo} order by waypoint_order
mapper.update: update waypoint set waypoint_status = 0 where waypoint_no = #{waypointNo}
